agentAbility.name: Contracts
agentAbility.description: Kent targets enemies and locks on them for 4s; then, the targeting becomes stationary and a ballistic strike is called on the designated spot. In 1.5s, another strike is locked onto the Contracted target and prepared, for a total of 3 strikes. Targeted enemies are Identified for all allies.

primaryAttack.name: Autoloader
primaryAttack.description: Allows firing several shots within a short time interval, after that, takes some time to reload empty drum.

tankAbilities.name: Smoke Launchers
tankAbilities.description: Deploy a smoke screen in front of the vehicle to obscure enemy vision.

tankAbilities.name: Grenade Machine Gun
tankAbilities.description: The Grenade Machine Gun fires rapid high-explosive shells, delivering devastating blows in close combat. Its slow projectile speed makes it less effective at long range.
